const Invoice = ({showSingleTask,closeInvoice,InvoiceId})=>{ return <>
INVOICE DETAILS  (title)
click here to go back {"->"} 

Invoice

From
Writers
To
Rodgers Ogada
Email: ogadarodgers@gmail.com
Date: October 16, 2021

Invoice Details:

Order # Order Name Title Status Date Completed Pay per page Pages Amount
123 123 123 123 123 123 123 123
Total: 0 Ksh
} const style={ button:{ marginTop:"10px", marginRight:'10px', border:"0px", outline:"0px", height:"40px", width:"40px", borderRadius:"20px", border:"1px solid #ecff" } } export default Invoice;
